comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: This was on July 3, 1913 and the occasion was the 50th anniversary of the Battle of Gettysburg. See related note at adjacent photograph in series here: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3641564726/in/p...

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks lifeasdaddy, for your link to the NYTimes article (in the adjacent photo) about the event.  It's a great read.  We'll fill in the caption information and add the date next time we update this record.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC -- Bain misspelled Gen. Liggett's name. This is Brigadier General Hunter Liggett, president of the Army War College, who was commander of the Gettysburg encampment during the 1913 reunion. Fort Hunter Liggett in California was named for him. He would have been 56 when this picture was taken. Wikipedia entry for Hunter Liggett: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hunter_Liggett

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Other Bain/LOC photos of Gen. Liggett (his name misspelled as Leggett) at the Gettysburg 50th anniversary commemoration: www.flickr.com/search/?q=leggett&w=8623220@N02
